name: Pocket Dancer: Harlem Shake Edition
description:
Get ready for the first game for iPhone that actually lets you DANCE! No other game gives your real life dancing a score.

Simply start the game and hold the phone or put it in your pocket. Dance to the music! Get one of 6 ratings at the end and compete with friends to see who can score the most points and be the true dancing champion!

This game is a blast to play in a group with your friends, at school, office or parties.

Features Game Center Integration so you can compete online.

Have Fun Dancing!

Original Harlem Shake music by Baauer, get the song on iTunes!
